short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Chrome Ass Extension. A fun way to spice up adjectives in a web page using the word ass.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assify finds adjectives in a web page and adds the word "ass" after them. It does not harvest data from the browser, just a simple find/replace extension.
